direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate SQL statements but handle different input types (Iterable vs. long).
Both methods generate SQL statements but with different input types (Schema vs. Schema and long).
generateStream relies on apply to generate individual SQL statements.
Both methods handle batch mode SQL generation with similar control flows.
Both methods handle SQL generation with similar control flows but different modes (batch vs. separated).
Both generateStream and other methods rely on appendTableInfo to construct table information.
Both generateStream and other methods rely on addValues to construct value lists for SQL statements.
Both generateStream and other methods rely on handleObject to handle different types of objects in SQL statements.
